description:
A La Rose Eau de Parfum - A Timeless Floral Masterpiece by Maison Francis Kurkdjian

Experience the exquisite beauty of A La Rose EDP, a magnificent floral symphony created by the legendary perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. This luxurious rose fragrance captures the essence of 400 freshly bloomed Damascena roses in each bottle, making it the ultimate expression of feminine elegance. ðŸŒ¸âœ¨

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
70ml Women Eau de Parfum EDP Maison Francis Kurkdjian

The Enchanting Rose Fragrance Notes

Top Notes Bergamot, Orange, Lemon, California Orange
Heart Notes Damascena Rose from Bulgaria, Centifolia Rose from Grasse, Violet
Base Notes Cedar, Musk

Key Features of A La Rose EDP

  • Created by master perfumer Francis Kurkdjian ðŸ’Ž
  • Features two precious rose varieties: Damascena from Bulgaria and Centifolia from Grasse ðŸŒ¹
  • Each 70ml bottle contains the essence of 400 freshly bloomed roses
  • Elegant glass bottle with a sophisticated design
  • Long-lasting floral fragrance with moderate sillage
  • Perfect for best-selling luxury fragrance collectors

Maison Francis Kurkdjian launched A La Rose in 2014 as a tribute to femininity and the queen of flowers. This new arrival to our collection represents the pinnacle of modern French perfumery, where traditional craftsmanship meets contemporary elegance. The house was founded in 2009 by Francis Kurkdjian, who previously created iconic scents for major fashion houses before establishing his own maison of luxury fragrances. ðŸ”¥

The delicate balance of rose perfume notes in A La Rose creates a luminous, fresh interpretation that avoids the heaviness sometimes associated with rose fragrances. The bright citrus opening gives way to the magnificent dual-rose heart, while the cedar and musk base provides elegant longevity without overwhelming the floral character. This makes it perfect for both daytime elegance and evening sophistication. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

How long does A La Rose EDP last on the skin?
A La Rose Eau de Parfum offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on the skin. The high-quality rose essence evolves beautifully throughout the day, with the initial fresh citrus and rose bouquet gradually transitioning to a more intimate musky-rose drydown. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and clothing (test fabric compatibility first). Many fragrance enthusiasts find that layering with unscented lotion before application can extend wear time even further. âœ¨

Indulge in the timeless elegance of A La Rose EDP - where each spray releases a garden of roses that tells the story of feminine grace and natural beauty. ðŸŒ¿
